title: In the beginning of the match
body: You know the you shall not pass, ring, that goes around the fountain; not allowing anyone to pass for the first 15 or so seconds? well if you use certain champions like leblanc for example and try to dash through the wall. You will find some interesting things. I found that leblanc stays in her dashing animation. Its nothing game changing its just fun to see. Figured i would share.

replies.body:
This happened once when I was Poro-Rider Sejuani and Kalista used her binding on me, I was clicking the map repeatedly and when I went into the death animation I stayed in it cause it happened at about the same time the "ring" thing goes away. So for about 10 seconds I was a giant dead poro sliding across the map. It was pretty hilarious.

I asked the people on my team if they could see it but they said they couldn't though.
lmfao, yeah it just depends on when u do it and if they really pay attention. I got stuck in the lee jump animation until i reused my W.

Yeah so it works with lee when you jump to an outside ward lol. Shen just gets blocked by the wall but it works for a few seconds he stays in his dash animation until the wall disappears. So i assume that almost every champ that can leap will have this freeze in their dash animation.
I know it works for vayne if u tumble right before it goes away. She will remain in her tumble form. I will try shen and see. I think seeing shen will be funny.
lol nice. Does the same happen for Shen? 'cause taunting shen walking around would be awesome.
